name: Lawless Confessions: Fight for the west!
name_original: Lawless Confessions: Fight for the west!
description: In the ever-expanding era of the gold rush war is always but a foot away. With eyes set on control of all land there just might be a confession or two to be made... Enjoy an open world western themed action-packed shooter adventure!!! The wild west is only for the toughest and most skilled gunmen to survive a place where if the bullets don't get you the elements will......Can You Survive? Play as different characters that each have unique and roles and accesses to different parts and different factions in a massive open world environment where you can create settlements, collect wanted bounties, raise livestock and sell produce collected, cut down trees and sell the lumber, basically anything the fun is endless!!!
